mapper.sql: a.id AS "user.id", u1.name AS "user.name", u1.cname AS "user.cname", a.praisedate AS "praisedate", a.praiseway AS "praiseway", a.reason AS "reason", a.score AS "score", a.student_id AS "studentId", a.booker AS "booker", a.bookdate AS "bookdate", a.confirmer AS "confirmer", a.confirmdate AS "confirmdate", a.approve AS "approve", a.status AS "status", a.headship AS "headship", a.opinion AS "opinion"
LEFT JOIN student_info u1 on u1.userid = a.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_praise( id, praisedate, praiseway, reason, score, student_id, booker, bookdate, confirmer, confirmdate, approve, status, headship, opinion ) VALUES ( #{user}, #{praisedate}, #{praiseway}, #{reason}, #{score}, #{studentId}, #{booker}, #{bookdate}, #{confirmer}, #{confirmdate}, #{approve}, #{status}, #{headship}, #{opinion} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_praise SET praisedate = #{praisedate}, praiseway = #{praiseway}, reason = #{reason}, score = #{score}, student_id = #{studentId}, booker = #{booker}, bookdate = #{bookdate}, confirmer = #{confirmer}, confirmdate = #{confirmdate}, approve = #{approve}, status = #{status}, headship = #{headship}, opinion = #{opinion} WHERE id = #{id}
